items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: T-manager is a lightweight web application designed for teams to collaborate on tasks efficiently. It provides an intuitive interface for task management, allowing users to create, assign, and update tasks in real-time.

items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.
items.title: Mudit2003/cloudsek-assignment: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.
